Chamber's Landing Buoy

Lake Tahoe, CA

Max boat length: 32"

Description: If you are looking at the shoreline, our buoy is located 4 docks down from Chambers Bar and Grill. The house is flying a Texas A&M flag on the dock and the buoy will be located out to the dock's left.
